segments.text: I watch the woman wipe the plate, oblivious to the chaos unfolding right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is an uncontrollable mess, and somehow she doesn't even seem to register it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how the water flows relentlessly over the edge, pooling dangerously on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of anger towards her; how can she not see what is going on?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are engaged in their own world of excitement, focused only on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering on the edge of the stool, and I can’t help but wince at the sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl clutches her hand in anticipation, and her eagerness is almost heartwarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary kitchen has transformed into a stage for their mischievous play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a reminder of how children see the world differently, filled with adventure and risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, in this mundane setting, I can’t shake the concern for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
